p: Due to the potential severity of the illness, the non-specific nature of initial investigations, and a minimum period of 6 to 10 days before confirmatory serology becomes available, a 5- to 7-day course of penicillin (benzylpenicillin 1.5 million units four times daily) or doxycycline (100â€¯mg twice daily) should be considered in patients with a flulike illness within 7 to 12 days of freshwater exposure.
